subfinder.install: Kali: go install -v github.com/projectdiscovery/subfinder/v2/cmd/subfinder@latest; Windows: go install -v github.com/projectdiscovery/subfinder/v2/cmd/subfinder@latest

amass.install: Kali: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y amass; Windows: winget install --id=OWASP.Amass -e

assetfinder.install: Kali: go install github.com/tomnomnom/assetfinder@latest; Windows: go install github.com/tomnomnom/assetfinder@latest

masscan.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y masscan; Windows: Download masscan64.exe from the MasscanForWindows repo and install WinPcap/npcap

nmap.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y nmap; Windows: Download and run the official Windows installer from nmap.org/download.html

eyewitness.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/FortyNorthSecurity/EyeWitness.git && cd EyeWitness && sudo ./setup.sh; Windows: Use WSL or follow README for Windows setup

aquatone.install: Kali: Download the latest Linux release zip, unzip, and move the aquatone binary to /usr/local/bin; Windows: Download the Windows zip from the releases, unzip and place aquatone.exe in your PATH

ffuf.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y ffuf; Windows: Download the Windows binary from ffuf releases and add to PATH, or compile from source with Go

gobuster.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y gobuster; Windows: Download the Windows release from gobuster releases or build with Go

linkfinder.install: Kali: pip3 install linkfinder; Windows: pip3 install linkfinder

gf.install: Kali: go install github.com/tomnomnom/gf@latest; Windows: go install github.com/tomnomnom/gf@latest

pamspider.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/Bo0oM/PamSpider.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/Bo0oM/PamSpider.git

arjun.install: Kali: pip3 install arjun; Windows: pip3 install arjun

dlox.install: Kali: pip3 install dlox; Windows: pip3 install dlox

xsstrike.install: Kali: pip3 install xsstrike; Windows: pip3 install xsstrike

sqlmap.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y sqlmap; Windows: Download sqlmap.zip from sqlmap.org or GitHub, unzip, and run python sqlmap.py

gopherus.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/tarunkant/Gopherus.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/tarunkant/Gopherus.git

interactsh-client.install: Kali: go install github.com/projectdiscovery/interactsh/cmd/interactsh-client@latest; Windows: go install github.com/projectdiscovery/interactsh/cmd/interactsh-client@latest

lfi-suite.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/D35m0nd142/LFISuite.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/D35m0nd142/LFISuite.git

fimap.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/kurobeats/fimap.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/kurobeats/fimap.git

oralizer.install: Kali: pip3 install oralizer; Windows: pip3 install oralizer

nikto.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y nikto; Windows: Install Strawberry Perl or use choco install nikto if available

httpx.install: Kali: go install -v github.com/projectdiscovery/httpx/cmd/httpx@latest; Windows: go install -v github.com/projectdiscovery/httpx/cmd/httpx@latest

kiterunner.install: Kali: go install github.com/assetnote/kiterunner@latest; Windows: go install github.com/assetnote/kiterunner@latest

jhaddix.install: Kali: go install github.com/jhaddix/domain@latest; Windows: go install github.com/jhaddix/domain@latest

waybackurls.install: Kali: go install github.com/tomnomnom/waybackurls@latest; Windows: go install github.com/tomnomnom/waybackurls@latest

awsbucketdump.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/jordanpotti/AWSBucketDump.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/jordanpotti/AWSBucketDump.git

cmseek.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/Tuhinshubhra/CMSeeK.git && cd CMSeeK && sudo pip3 install -r requirements.txt; Windows: git clone https://github.com/Tuhinshubhra/CMSeeK.git && cd CMSeeK && pip3 install -r requirements.txt

wafw00f.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y wafw00f; Windows: pip3 install wafw00f

gitdumper.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/arthaud/git-dumper.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/arthaud/git-dumper.git

msfvenom.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y metasploit-framework; Windows: Download and run the Metasploit for Windows installer from Rapid7 or use choco install metasploit

metasploit-framework.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y metasploit-framework; Windows: Download and run the Metasploit for Windows installer from Rapid7 or use choco install metasploit

findomain.install: Kali: wget -qO findomain.zip https://github.com/Edu4rdSHL/findomain/releases/latest/download/findomain-linux.zip && unzip findomain.zip && sudo mv findomain /usr/local/bin/; Windows: Download findomain-windows.zip from Findomain releases, unzip, and add findomain.exe to your PATH

dnsx.install: Kali: go install -v github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/cmd/dnsx@latest; Windows: go install -v github.com/projectdiscovery/dnsx/cmd/dnsx@latest

gowitness.install: Kali: go install github.com/sensepost/gowitness@latest; Windows: go install github.com/sensepost/gowitness@latest

jsfinder.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/Threezh1/JSFinder.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/Threezh1/JSFinder.git

SecretFinder.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/m4ll0k/SecretFinder.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/m4ll0k/SecretFinder.git

paramspider.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/devanshbatham/paramspider.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/devanshbatham/paramspider.git

dalfox.install: Kali: go install github.com/hahwul/dalfox/v2@latest; Windows: go install github.com/hahwul/dalfox/v2@latest

kxss.install: Kali: go install github.com/Emoe/kxss@latest; Windows: go install github.com/Emoe/kxss@latest

ssrfmap.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/swisskyrepo/SSRFmap.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/swisskyrepo/SSRFmap.git

liffy.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/D35m0nd142/Liffy.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/D35m0nd142/Liffy.git

testssl.sh.install: Kali: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/drwetter/testssl.sh.git; Windows: Run under WSL or MSYS2/Cygwin (bash is needed); clone repository as above or use the official Docker image

apkleaks.install: Kali: pip3 install apkleaks; Windows: pip3 install apkleaks

gau.install: Kali: go install github.com/lc/gau/v2/cmd/gau@latest; Windows: go install github.com/lc/gau/v2/cmd/gau@latest

s3scanner.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y s3scanner; Windows: winget install s3scanner or go install -v github.com/sa7mon/S3Scanner@latest

wpscan.install: Kali: sudo apt-get install -y wpscan; Windows: Use WSL or download the Windows gem package. (Chocolatey: choco install wpscan if you have it.)

gittools.install: Kali: git clone https://github.com/internetwache/GitTools.git; Windows: git clone https://github.com/internetwache/GitTools.git
